original_text: And when he had opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven about the space of half an hour.
korean_text: 일곱째 인을 떼실 때에 하늘이 반 시간쯤 고요하더니

sentences.original_text: And when he had opened the seventh seal
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 일곱째 인을 열었을 때

sentences.original_text: about the space of half an hour
